q2: Turin is located in the northern part of Italy.
q3: How many people there and how many of them are Juventus fans?
a3: There are just under 900,000 people living in Turin.  I have to imagine Juventus has a big following there.
a4: Juventus has black and white jersey.
q5: Cristiano will make a difference in this team?
a5: CR7 will lead Juventus in UEFA Champions League
